::Decadel::

       Decadel felt like destroying the remaing Predacons who =
were now under Phobia, after they we're weakened from the Maximals' attack.=
  In his underground factory, special bots were being created.  Soon, he wo=
uld have 6 bots who loyally served him.  Subtrons.  Then he would show thos=
e Predacons.  Without any stupid Predacons in the way, he would then take o=
ut the Maximals, and then, the hardest phase would be the Alliance.  Patien=
ce was required for the making of the Subtrons.  Decadel just had to sit an=
d wait, and then see how his fighters did out in the world.  For the while,=
 he sat, and read a quiet book in his underground library, while keeping a =
close eye on Hell Drak, from his newly established cameras, which he could =
see what they saw anytime.
